reviewText:
Surely the price is a mistake?
I remember watching both these movies when Joe Bob Briggs was on the movie channel.
They were exploitation films with a so-so plot.

So why do the pair of these movies warrant that kind of price tag???

The two movies are softcore(a little more than that actually!) released initially by playboy and have interactive features where you can choose whether certain scenes should go ahead or change tracks! Surprisingly, in addition to being shot well and outdoors, they are also funny and certainly worth the price!!
great softcore movie very hot girls. I do recommend it for softcore movies lovers.

This movie is basically about two perverts(especially the driver) whom cannot resist the temptation of the 'buns' when on their way to Malibu and Vegas for the second disc. You can choose to see whom would like to see the driver have sex with while you play throught the DVD or you could choose to ignore the women and continue the journey while on the way watching the DVD. This title of DVDs are although under the company Image entertainment but the DVD is in fact by playboy/playgirl company. The two DVDs are good recommendations for those whom prefer numerous number of sexual content. One of the rather funny scene is the sexual content between two police officer Kira Reed and another woman offering sex for the the driver and his friend and relase them during the night time while the other is the 'cannot take it' facial expression when Kira Reed was having sexual movement with her colleague while recording down two lady citizens whom file police report against some issues. I do not wish to talk more but its better for all to buy and find out more, very very interesting.

N/B: Please remove my first review which is too lousily explained, thanks....:-)

FAST LANE TO MALIBU and FAST LANE TO VEGAS are a couple of competently put together soft core movies with a great selection of beautiful women. My favorite being Renee Rea.
But there is also, Tracy Ryan, Kelli McCarty, Kira Reed, Nikki Fritz, Susan Featherly, Flower Edwards, Tera Patrick, Ava Lake, Sarah Kalla, Dee Summers, Sasha Peralto and Kelly Alane.
The scenes are the kind of scenes you expect from a well made soft core movie. All are fun. Most are exciting. All of them women are BEAUTIFUL. The stories are fairly decent for these type of movies.
The thing that surpised me about buying these DVD's and the most noteable reason that people who like these sort of movies should consider buying them is that they're INTERACTIVE.
That's right! For those that have seen the VIDEO tape version of the movies... there are NEW SCENES.... depending on the decisions you make and most are pretty darn hot. There are numerous extra scenes, not in the original video releases... depending on the decisions you make.
This is a fantastic idea for these type movies. I hope they make more of these in the future, but I would suggest one thing. Somebody do it RIGHT!!  I give BIG Points for the producers of these movies for doing it (novel idea), but a few of the choose your own paths in these are pretty silly and don't work. But some work REALLY REALLY WELL!!
Hopefully somebody will really explore the choose your own adventure movies when it comes to DVD, and do one really really well. Film A LOT MORE SCENES with multiple paths.  If you like these movies and have seen these movies before. Give them a shot. Kinda cool to throw in the interactive aspects.
